item.title: Introduction to R
item.description: Introduction Getting a feel for R The console Function calls and arguments HINT: Getting help Reading time: 3 minute(s) @ 200 WPM. DRAFT DRAFT DRAFT DRAFT DRAFT DRAFT DRAFT Introduction Readers may find the Glossary of Statistical Terms helpful. R is a free, open-source, cross-platform statistical and graphical environment that can be obtained from www.r-project.org. Some reasons for using R: R is world-class software for data analysis and visualization.
